parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Steering Box Bracket Failure and Chassis Damage
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering box bracket can cause erratic steering, loss of control, and accidents, potentially resulting in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: steering box bracket broken or torn
chassis damage or torn in half.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire tread separation can lead to sudden loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: sudden vibration or wobbling of the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The structural failure of the steering box bracket can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The steering box bracket cracks or breaks
the vehicle experiences loss of steering control
the vehicle pulls to one side while driving.
